content: lachesis and co presents belmondo by tori gurbisz a triangular shawl worked in a lattice pattern from tip to shoulders with optional fringe sizes small medium large gauge gauge is not important for this project materials malabrigo yarn twist 150 yds 3 5 oz 1 2 2 skeins us 11/ 8mm us 13/9mm 24 circular needles yarn needle crochet hook for fringe optional skill level beginner abbreviations co - cast on k - knit p - purl k2tog - knit 2 stitches together yo - yarn over bobble - bind off sts - stitches rs - right side notes the small version is knit on size 11/8mm needles and the medium and large on size 13/9mm the medium can be knit from one skein if the fringe is omitted but be prepared to use every last inch www lachesisandco blogspot com © 2010 tori gurbisz all rights reserved for private non-commercial use only set-up row co 4 sts row 1 rs k row 2 k row 3 k2 yo k2 row 4 k2 p1 k2 row 5 k2 yo k1 yo k2 row 6 k2 purl to last 2 sts k2 when these row are complete move on to the pattern row pattern row row 1 k2 yo k2tog yo repeat to last 3 sts k1 yo k2 row 2 k2 p to last 2 sts k2 row 3 k2 yo k1 yo k2tog repeat to last 2 sts yo k2 row 4 k2 p to last 2 sts k2 work the pattern row until piece measures approximately 18 17 25 inches straight up from the co edge having just worked a row 3 next 2 row k all sts bobble all stitches loosely try using a needle one to two sizes larger than you knit this project with or use your favorite loose bobble technique finishing wash and block shawl weave in all ends for fringe cut 45 51 63 10-12 inch lengths of yarn divide into 15 17 21 groups of 3 with rs facing beg at the tip of the shawl co edge fold 3 lengths of yarn in half forming a loop at one end thread the loop through the garter st edge of shawl pull ends through open loop using crochet hook if you prefer securing the fringe to the shawl work from the center tip along the edge of shawl placing fringe approx every 4 inches © 2010 tori gurbisz all rights reserved for private non-commercial use only
